title: One Piece Episode #573 Anime Review
author: The Fandom Post
description: A detailed review of episode 573, discussing the closure of the Fish-Man Island storyline and the crew's preparation to move towards the New World and Big Mom. The review notes the episode provides a good nod towards the past and looks at where the characters are now.

title: 573-574: Finally Time to Go! Goodbye, Fish-Man Island! and To the New World! Heading for the Ultimate Sea!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A blog post covering episodes 573-574, discussing the emotional farewell scenes, Madame Sharley's prophecy, the New World Log Pose, and Shirahoshi's promise. The blogger felt the arc truly ended when the Straw Hats pulled away from the harbor and overall liked the arc despite some pacing issues.

title: One Piece - Fishman Island Arc (Episodes 554 - 574) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the entire Fish-Man Island arc, including episode 573. The review discusses how the arc served as a post-timeskip showcase and analyzes its reception among fans. Notes that many casual fans checked out during this arc as it was seen as a pace killer.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Fish-Man Island arc

title: One Piece Theory: Luffy Will Destroy Fish-Man Island Himself - For the Better
author: CBR
description: An article analyzing the theory that Luffy will eventually destroy Fish-Man Island to fulfill Joy Boy's promise, allowing fish-men to live on the surface and ending discrimination. Discusses Madame Sharley's prophecy from the Fish-Man Island arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains theories and speculation about future events in One Piece

title: One Piece: Why Fish-Man Island Is Far More Important Than You Think
author: Game Rant
description: An analysis article explaining the long-term significance of the Fish-Man Island arc, including how plot points established in this arc will come into play towards the end of the series. Discusses Joy Boy's promise and its connection to the series' endgame.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers and analysis of the Fish-Man Island arc's long-term significance

title: Episode 573 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: The official One Piece Wiki page for episode 573, containing comprehensive information about the episode including plot summary, character appearances, production credits, and trivia.

title: [Analysis] One Piece â€“ The Significance Of The Tamatebako
author: 12Dimension
description: An in-depth analysis of the Tamatebako treasure box and its significance to the story. Discusses the bomb hidden inside and its potential future implications, connecting to events from episode 573 where Neptune decides not to tell the Straw Hats about it.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains analysis and theories about the Tamatebako's future significance

title: One Piece: Fishman Island (517-574) - Finally Time to Go! Goodbye, Fish-Man Island!
author: Toei Animation
description: Official streaming of episode 573 on Crunchyroll. Luffy and his crew bid farewell to their new friends before setting off in search of the greatest adventures the New World has to offer.
